item.title: Resume
item.dc:creator: satrya
item.content:encoded:
Lucifer Morningstar

Senior Graphic Designer
  • lucifer@lucifer.com
  • +1 (070) 123-4567
  • @lucifer
  • lucifer.com
  • Manchester, UK
Download CV

About

A talented and creative graphic designer with an eye for detail looking for an entry-level role at a reputable clothing brand. Has hands-on experience in designing both apparel and textiles from internship.

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user-friendly but at the same time attractive. Moreover, I add personal touch to your product and make sure that is eye-catching and easy to use. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. I created web design for many famous brand companies.

Experience

Creative Director​

2020 — Present

Directly collaborated with the creative team to develop internal and clients websites. Responsible to manage and maintenance more than 5 internal websites. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem blanditiis praesentium voluptum delenit atque corrupti, quos dolores et qvuas molestias exceptur. Art Director​

2018 — 2020

Directly collaborated with the creative team to develop internal and clients websites. Responsible to manage and maintenance more than 5 internal websites. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem blanditiis praesentium voluptum delenit atque corrupti, quos dolores et qvuas molestias exceptur. Graphic Designer

2015 — 2018

Directly collaborated with the creative team to develop internal and clients websites. Responsible to manage and maintenance more than 5 internal websites. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem blanditiis praesentium voluptum delenit atque corrupti, quos dolores et qvuas molestias exceptur.

Experience

University School of the Arts

2010 — 2014

Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem blanditiis praesentium voluptum delenit atque corrupti, quos dolores et qvuas molestias exceptur. Graphic Designer Bootcamp

2007 — 2010

Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem blanditiis praesentium voluptum delenit atque corrupti, quos dolores et qvuas molestias exceptur.

Portfolio

Contact

Lucifer Morningstar

Senior Graphic Designer
  • lucifer@lucifer.com
  • +1 (070) 123-4567
  • @lucifer
  • lucifer.com
  • Manchester, UK
Download CV

About

A talented and creative graphic designer with an eye for detail looking for an entry-level role at a reputable clothing brand. Has hands-on experience in designing both apparel and textiles from internship.

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user-friendly but at the same time attractive. Moreover, I add personal touch to your product and make sure that is eye-catching and easy to use. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. I created web design for many famous brand companies.

Experience

Creative Director​

2020 — Present

Directly collaborated with the creative team to develop internal and clients websites. Responsible to manage and maintenance more than 5 internal websites. Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem blanditiis praesentium voluptum delenit atque corrupti, quos dolores et qvuas molestias exceptur. Art Director​

2018 — 2020

About

A talented and creative graphic designer with an eye for detail looking for an entry-level role at a reputable clothing brand. Has hands-on experience in designing both apparel and textiles from internship.

My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user-friendly but at the same time attractive. Moreover, I add personal touch to your product and make sure that is eye-catching and easy to use. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way. I created web design for many famous brand companies.
